short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generates test images of any width and height, with text and a background.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Test Image Maker (TIM) lets you quickly and easily generate PNG, JPG, or WebP images of specific width and height. 

If your work (like mine) involves creating test pages, facebook profiles, youtube channels, or any other digital property where you upload images for avatars, banners, logos, etc, you might find TIM useful. Come one, come all, product managers, quality engineers, customer service reps, and content producers!

With TIM you can specify a width and height and within seconds generate the exact size of image you need with an attractive background and some text on it. That's it. You can save your settings as favorites, so you can generate new Facebook profile placeholders over and over if you want to.
